string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Better late than never, but never late is better."
"Shout out to the home owners, the girls that got diplomas and enough money to loan us."
"All the girls that played me eat yo mutha heart out it's Drizzzyyyy"
"Still spending every dollar they encourage me to save but I'm gooood"
"Look at where I landed, you would think I planned it. I'm just doin me and you can never understand it."
"It takes a certain type of man to teach, to be far from hood but understand the streets."
"Wayne if your on Mars can you pick me up from Jupiter."
"My reality is brighter than your dreams are."
"I'm still myself, suicide bars I kill myself, charge it to the game I bill myself, and I don't feel yall but I feel myself."
"I tell patron truths, I tell you Henny lies."
"Drake just stands for Do Right And Kill Everything."
"I meet quotas while you rappers having sleep overs, spending nights in the studio tryna beat Hova."
"You accomplish in a week what I'm daily required."
"If amazing was a young bitch, I'd be going to jail cuz I'm fucking amazing."
"They say real girls ain't never perfect, perfect girls ain't never real."
"Cause you know life is what we make it and a chance is like a picture, it'd be nice if you'd just take it."
"I need you to rescue me from my destiny. I'm tryna live right and give you whatever's left of me."
"I be up all night, whole crew's in here, 'cause I don't really know who I'ma lose this year."
"Famous like a drug that I've taken too much of. But I never ever trip, just peace, happiness, and love."
"And if you dolled up, I got the voodoo for you b-tches."
"Bracelet sayin' you should quit. Cars sayin' f-ck ya life."
"I'm havin' a good time, they just tryin' to ruin it. Shout out to the fact that I'm the youngest n---a doin' it."
"N---as with no money act like money isn't everything."
"Kush rolled, glass full, I prefer the better things."
"Okay, we outta here, toodles to you b-tches."
"And life ain't a rehearsal the cameras always rollin."
"Like I catch em stealing flows cause I swear I never loaned it."
"Every time you see me I look like I hit the lotto twice."
"World Series attitude, champagne bottle life. Nothing ever changes so tonight is like tomorrow night."
"Im bout my paper like a muthf---ing scratch and win."
"If you think I'ma quit before I die - dream on."
"I did it overnight, it couldn't happen any quicker."
"I can teach you how to speak my language - Rosetta Stone."
"Bout to set it off in this bitch - Jada Pinkett."
"I have these n----s trippin', no luggage."
"Just holla if you got me and f--k you if you had me."
"And whoever got the torch just can't seem to hold it steady cause I see the flame flickerin'."
"Please startin doin' you, I been doin' me."
"And I got love for everybody, even if you suein' me."
"Coldest thing droppin' and these b-tches wanna snow blow. And they just give me head while the haters give me promo."
"I'm still fly, I'm sky high, and I dare anybody to try and cut my wings."
"Startin' poppin bottles cause it's ATL tradition to."
"I am on a 24 hour champagne diet."
"So can you do me a favor? If i pull it together, make it sooner than later."
"I want it all, thats why I strive for it. I know that it's coming - I just hope that i'm alive for it."
"This lost boy got fly without Peter Pan."
"I think better when I'm not sober."
"I may not mean nothing to y'all but understand nothin was done for me so i dont plan on stoppin' at all."
"Everybody talk and everybody listen, but somehow it's always the truth that comes up missing."
"We all got dreams and we all star reaching."
"Sweat pants, hair tied, chillin with no make-up on. That's when you're the prettiest, I hope that you don't take it wrong."
"She just stuck in houstatlantavegas."
"Life change for us every single week so it's good but I know this ain't the peak yet."
"Last name ever first name ever greatest."
"24 hours from greatness, I'm that close. Don't ever forget the moment you began to doubt."
"I just want to be successful."
"And you ain't even gotta ask twice. You can have my heart or we can share it like the last slice."
"And I can hear the critics talking over the applause."
"The girl or the world. You see someone gotta lose. I thought i could have it all, do I really gotta choose?"
"Tellin every girl she the one for me and I ain't even plannin to call."
"Everyone who doubted me is askin' for forgiveness."
"Inside I'm treadin water steady trying to swim ashore."
"We don't have Resolutions we've just got Reservations. I try to live my life right every day."
"Seven days without love makes one weak."
"Cause you know life is what we make it and a chance is like a picture, it'd be nice if you'd just take it."
"I need you to rescue me from my destiny. I'm tryna live right and give you whatever's left of me."
"I be up all night, whole crew's in here, 'cause I don't really know who I'ma lose this year."
"Famous like a drug that I've taken too much of. But I never ever trip, just peace, happiness, and love."
"And if you dolled up, I got the voodoo for you b-tches."
"Bracelet sayin' you should quit. Cars sayin' f-ck ya life."
"I'm havin' a good time, they just tryin' to ruin it. Shout out to the fact that I'm the youngest nigga doin' it."
"Niggas with no money act like money isn't everything."
"Kush rolled, glass full, I prefer the better things."
"Okay, we outta here, toodles to you bitches."
"And life ain't a rehearsal the cameras always rollin."
"Every time you see me I look like I hit the lotto twice."
"Im bout my paper like a muthfucking scratch and win."
"If you think I'ma quit before I die - dream on."
"I did it overnight, it couldn't happen any quicker."
"I have these niggas trippin', no luggage."
"Just holla if you got me and fuck you if you had me."
"And I got love for everybody, even if you suein' me."
"Please startin doin' you, I been doin' me."
"Coldest thing droppin' and these b-tches wanna snow blow. And they just give me head while the haters give me promo."
"And whoever got the torch just can't seem to hold it steady cause I see the flame flickerin'"
"Startin' poppin bottles cause it's ATL tradition to."
"I'm still fly, I'm sky high, and I dare anybody to try and cut my wings."
"I want it all, thats why I strive for it. I know that it's coming - I just hope that i'm alive for it."
"So can you do me a favor? If i pull it together, make it sooner than later."
"Everybody talk and everybody listen, but somehow it's always the truth that comes up missing."
"Sweat pants, hair tied, chillin with no make-up on. That's when you're the prettiest, I hope that you don't take it wrong."
"Life change for us every single week so it's good but I know this ain't the peak yet."
"Last name ever first name ever greatest."
"24 hours from greatness, I'm that close. Don't ever forget the moment you began to doubt."
"I may not mean nothing to y'all but understand nothin was done for me so i dont plan on stoppin' at all."
"I think better when I'm not sober."
"Everyone who doubted me is askin' for forgiveness."
"Tellin every girl she the one for me and I ain't even plannin to call."
"And you ain't even gotta ask twice. You can have my heart or we can share it like the last slice."
"I always fall your type."
"Everybody dies but not everybody lives."
"Inside I'm treadin water steady trying to swim ashore."
"Talking to myself but I never listen."
"The hardest part about the fucking business is minding your own."
"I wonder why I never learned my lesson."
"I've been down this road before and yeah I skidded but forget it."
"Doin' target practice; all these bitches just aiming to please."
"Niggas wanna be friends how coincidental."
"A young King, pay me in gold."
"You a star in my eyes."
"I swear this shit is as fun as it looks."
"I'm really tryna make it more than what it is, cause everybody dies but not everybody lives."
"I heard you good with them soft lips."
"I come alive in the night time."
"Say my name, say my name, wear it out."
"I might just put up with the arguing and stay for real."
"You with all those curves and me without no breaks."
"Tell them bitches that you'll always be my misses."
"The hardest part about the fucking business is minding your own."
"Even when I throw them deuces you just send it back around."
"Life's story is as quick as the wink of an eye...love's story is merely hello and goodbye...until we meet again..."
"Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana."
"Even though it seems you're losing me...and things ain't what they used to be...dont worry."
"Niggas with no money act like money isn't everything."
"I'm busy getting rich, I don't want trouble."
"I got money in these jeans, so they fit me kinda snug."
"It's feeling like the second chance and its the first impression."
"I prefer the better things."
"I'm busy getting rich, I don't want trouble."
"I got money in these jeans, so they fit me kinda snug."
"All up in yo face man I hate to put you through it."
"I love my team, I would die for them niggas."
"I'm having a good time, they just trying to ruin it. Shoutout to the fact that I'm the youngest nigga doing it."
"Whole crew's in here 'cause I don't really know who I'ma lose this year."
"Show me a good time."
"I live for the nights that I can't remember with the people that I won't forget."
"Let's get right, now that I'm here show me a good time."
"How did I end up right here with you after all the things that I been through? It's been one of those days you try to forget about it, take a shot and let it out."
"Presidential suite girl - Barack Hussein."
"Young and rich and out of control."
"Call me overrated, or created or two jaded, because anyway you put it bitch I made it!"
"Ain't no turning back for me; I'm in it til it's over."
"You can't have my heart, the doctor told me I'd be dead without it."
"You let me go, little did you know I could've made it all on my own."
"You have to risk going too far to discover just how far you can really go."
"I'd rather be an optimist who is sometimes wrong than a pessimist who is always right."
"They stay kicking it with me like a field goal."
"And the way that I jack son you think that Drake new Samuel."
"So they don't like me and pop parties and yet they never invite me."
"Nosey niggas speaking in my window."
"Took a lot of patience and action, I grind so I'm anticipating relaxin."
"I provide protection if you open up the door for me."
"Dedicating time when I really can't afford to be."
"Who killed Chivalry? They need to get their sentencing, meanwhile we argue and I can't get a sentence in."
"You be the baddest girl around round round and they notice, they notice."
"Them other niggas just wanna hit it, but if they had it they wouldn't know what to do with it!"
"I'm addicted to fresh, so you could either get with the real or stick with the rest."
"Get it, got it, good, gotta get it going 'cause I don't want you confused it's always better knowing."
"It's only right I make you aware I am the only rapper taking you there."
"Put on some P. Reign, thats somethin hood girl. We all know that RnB is for the good girls."
"They tend to call me a college cat, I ball hard and Toronto please acknowldge that."
"I'm more than just an option; refuse or be forgotten."
"We all fall... so may I send you four blessings... Older Wine, Younger Lovers, Faster Cars, and a Slow Descent."
"Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Just walk beside me and be my friend."
"When a young man complains that a young lady has no heart, it's pretty certain that she has his."
"I better find your loving...I better find your heart."
"Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is You'er than You."
"Being real is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are... you aren't."
"I won't judge her, and I could never love her. But to her I'm just a Baller and she could find another..."
"Just smile and smell good."
"Life ain't no rehearsal, the cameras always rolling."
"Life is like a confused teacher...first she gives the test and then teaches the lesson."
"Cooler than Mick Jagger with the stones, stop jacking my swagger cause my swagger is my own."
"Don't go through life...grow through life."
"Now that it's over. I should have known better than to think this is real and you could be mine."
"Nothing ever changing so tonight is like tomorrow night."
"May all your joys be pure joys, and all your pain champagne."
"I hope this isn't one of those forever things, its funny how money can change everything."
"I sit and drink wine and watch californiacation of life!"
"Point the biggest skeptic out, I'll make him a believer."
"I want it all that's why I strive for it. Diss me and never get a reply for it."
"Life is moving fast where the fuck do all these minutes go?!"
"If they love u to death, never die on them."
"The pressure's on both hearts beat like a metronome both in sync like a justin song, feel so right but it's just so wrong."
"So we don't confirm the fling keep avoiding all the questions you can teach me many things i'm just scared to learn a lesson."
"No strings attached your love is so wifi."
"She just too far away for affection, so I pray that we never lose the connection..."
"Today I bent the truth to be kind, and I have no regret, for I am far surer of what is kind than I am of what is true."
"As far as recession goes I know it's a difficult time out here for people, but me, myself I honestly have to say I've been put in a blessed position."
"Shows are great, internet is great, but at the end of the day you got to sell records."
"Nigga, I'm the man, I sent your girl message; Said I see you when I can She send me one back but I ain't never read it. 'Cause pussy's only pussy and I get it when I need it."
"Don't know why it happens every time we alone. But here we are again and I swear I'm in my zone."
"So I'ma sip this drink till that motherfucker gone. Than you go get undressed and we gon' get it on."
"It's funny how someone else's success brings pain."
"When you're no longer involved that person has it all, and you're just stuck standing there."
"I'm gonna' need you to say something baby."
"Uhh, I am the topic of conversation this a celebration."
"As far as liquor goes, I'm a hennessy man."
"Nicki Minaj is a very tempting individual, she's very attractive; we're close."
"In order to gain loyal fans, I had to give away a lot of music."
"I wanna do it all tonight I got plans, I have a certain lust for life and as it stands."
"Let's toast to the fact that I moved out my momma's basement."
"Killing shit the ever so talented Mr. Ripley."
"What's a star when its most important fan is missing?"
"Other niggas' situations, they are all depressin'."
"I drive two black cars, I named them Malcolm X and Martin Luther."
"I am more than what you bargained for and nothing less than real."
"Never drop the ball, fuck are y'all thinkin'?"
"Making sure the Young Money ship is never sinkin."
"I could teach you how to speak my language, Rosetta Stone."
"Finally here, I'm a star with the timing, my swagga is chill, and my flow is reclining."
"Universe is just a verse of me, I keep it generic and the niggas take it personally."
"Livin life from a whole different angle, only see the road through the wings of an angel!"
"It's a shame, she had me convinced that she could've been a dime. I guess, I lost another one to the wintertime."
"If amazing was a young girl I would be in jail because I'm fuckin' amazing."
"Either or my nigga, make sure you don't get shelved. Make sure your money's right and they do a promotion well, so you could get checks cut like Benedict in Ocean's 12."
"Fuck you, pussy ass haters you should do you."
"You ain't heard of me, then you should go and get a blues clue; oops I mean a red clue, Wayne's here; Suwoo."
"To have known me would mean there was a knew me."
"When raindrops hit the tin roof its crazy. Thats a metaphor, did I lose ya baby?"
"And I belong right where you see me. Ain't on the fence about it, I ain't Mr. Feeny."
"I can paint what's goin through my mind, racing against myself but I'm a couple steps behind."
"Why do i feel so alone? Like everybody passing through the studio is in character as if we acting out a movie role."
"I'm still fly, I'm sky high; and I dare anybody to try and cut my wings."
"I'm addicted to this life, its gonna be hard to quit."
"I be at the parties where you stuck outside and cant come in."
"I got a sex pistol pointed right at you."
"Nothing ever changes so tonight is like tomorrow night."
"Say baby, Ive got to mention that if i you were a star youd be the one I'm searching for."
"Hate is so familiar to me, Im slowly embracing it. Doesnt come natural...bear with me it could take a bit."
"I know what to do with it."
"Go Cinderella. Go Cinderella. Orgasm blush. Lipstick n conceiler. Devil in a tight dress. Girl you a killer and aint nobody realer."
"We walk the same path, but got on different shoes."
"Until you find yourself, its impossible to lose you. Because I never had you, although I would be glad to."
"People I dont have the time to hang with always look at me and say the same shit. You promised me you would never change."
"Many fine things can be done in a day if you dont always make that day tomorrow."
"I pick and choose. I dont get shit confused. I got a small circle, Im not with different crews."
"Kush got the room smelling like teen spirit."
"You never see it coming. You just get to see it go."
"Im sitting in a chair but in the future its a throne."
"I dont judge her but I could never love her."
"I be gettin' high, just to balance out the lows."
"They be staring at the money like its unfamiliar."
"Life aint no rehearsal: the cameras always rollin."
"Who do you look up to when youre better than your idols?"
"R.I.P. to the girl you used to see. Her days are over, baby shes over. Ive decided to give you all of me."
"Lifes story is as quick as the wink of an eye¦loves story is merely hello and goodbye¦until we meet again."
"You promised me you would never change."
"She doesnt ever worry, if she wants it shell get it on her own, she knows theres more to life, and shes scared of ending up alone."
"Fame is like a drug that Ive taken too much of...but I never ever trip, just peace, happiness, and love."
"I'm really tryna make it more than what it is, cuz everybody dies but not everybody lives!"
"I pop bottles cause I bottle my emotions, at least I put it out in the open."
"Hope you forgive me.....never meant wrong. Tried to be patient but waited too long...."
"Live without pretending, Love without depending, Listen without defending, Speak without offending."
"Better late than never, but never late is better."
"They say real girls ain't never perfect, perfect girls ain't never real."
"I'm really tryna make it more than what it is, cause everybody dies but not everybody lives."
"We always ignore the ones who adore us, and adore the ones who ignore us."
"I know they say that first love is the sweetest, but that first cut is the deepest."
"You gotta own it if you want it. Kisses all on her body, she tells me live in the moment. And baby, Ill never forget none of that. Girl I told you I was coming back"
"La Familia, Ive been inducted and instructed to stunt on these niggas we dont really fuck wit"
"In one nigga, amazing shit I got that Courtney Love for you, that crazy shit"
"I dont drink every bottle I own, I be aging shit. And I got them wedding ring flows, that engaging shit"
"Girls countin on me to be there like missing rubbers, I'm on some Marvin Gaye shit a bunch of distant lovers."
"Hope you forgive me, I never meant wrong. Tried to be patient... but waited too long. But I would of came back."
"I'm urging all daughters to kiss they mothers, with those lips that all the lipstick covers. You're never too grown up to miss and hug her."
"I hate callin women bitches but bitches love it."
"Dedicating time when I really can't afford to be, I'll provide protection if you open the door for me."
"They always say the hottest love has the coldest end."
"Don't get impatient when it takes to long and drink it all even when it taste too strong."
"I gotta feel alive, even if it kills me. Promise to always give you me, the real me."
"The always tell me no one is working as hard as you, and even though I laugh it off man its probably true."
"I keep thinking how young can you die from old age."
"Ice cream conversations, they all want the scoop."
"Oh well I guess you win some and lose some, long as the outcome is income."
"I think I'm scared of what the future holds. I was wishing for some things and now I'm use to those."
"Every girl I meet thinks I'm fucking groupie hoes. The honesty of my music has left me too exposed."
"Now security follow me everywhere so I'm never actually am alone, I just always feel alone."
"Yall the reason for a lot of my devotion, you know I spend money because spending time is hopeless."
"Staring at the members of my team who get questioned about they profit from this million dollar scheme. Just know that I'm in debt for you defending all our dreams."
"I could use a writer to balance my flows. But I never share my thoughts, This is all a nigga knows."
"I be getting high just to balance out the lows."
"You always be callin her, she ain't never answerin, you ain't figured out I am the reason she's cancelin."
"The game ain't always fair and that's the thing though, you can play ya heart but everyone don't get a ring though."
"Can I hit it in the morning? The sun rise while your moanin."
"I use to to go to the stables and get the kids to bet me, and I would always ride the stallions whenever she let me."
"Baby you winter time cold, the night is still young drink that dinner wine slow."
"Stunt so hard I make these niggas hate summer, and pray for winter. But when it's winter time I'm still waiting on these niggas at the finish line."
"I let the beat bang I don't claim colors, honestly the honesty is why the game loves us."
"I'm the one to blame, now that I'm around shit will never be the same."
"I'm tryna bring it home even if I gotta do it on my own, I'm a mufukkin killlaaaa"
"Even when I'm not functioning in tip top shape, I can bench as much as hip hop weighs."
"You would swear we planted trees the way the money's grown. We been busy like some bees no honeycomb, and you can prolly feel the breeze when the money's blown."
"From the begining to the end know I'm into making history not into making friends."
"I infiltrated the game, I was hesitant at first then feared what it would change. Now I'm high off the success and faded off of the fame."
"Man I love my team.. I would die for them n-ggas.."
"I be up all night.. whole crews in here, cause I don't really know who I'mma lose this year."
"I'm about whatever man.. F-ck what they be talking about, they opinon doesn't count, we the only thing that matters."
"Fame is like a drug that I've taken too much of but I never ever trip just peace happiness and love."
"I'm busy getting rich, I don't want trouble. I made enough for two niggas boy stunt double."
"I tried to told you, Drizzy still aint nothing nice. Bracelet saying you should quit, cars saying f-ck ya life."
"Kush rolled, glass full, I prefer the better things. Niggas with no money act like money isn't everything."
"Before these haters kill me in my sleep, I'd like to say its been a pleasure."
"Ducking your questions, f-ck your suggestions, money gets all of my love and affection."
"Im nervous but im about to kill it cause they about to let the realist team in."
"Girls fall through like coins in a couch, now we just f-ckin all the b-tches they warned us about."
"This one is for all my niggas from my city tryin to diss. Without a response from me you really fail to exist, and I love to see you fail that feelin' there is the shit."
"Weezy im just out here reppin' us, till I get to shake the hand of the man that's blessin' us."
"People ask how music is goin' I heard it pays, I just came off makin' 2 million in 30 days."
"Take a look at yourself the mirror's revealin'. If you aint got it you ain't got it the theory is brilliant."
"Im in the crib stackin' money from here to the ceilin'. Whatever it is I got is clearly appealin'."
"Look how the champagne diamonds flow. Find dining, pour another another glass when the wine is low."
"Discussin' life and all our common goals, smart kids that smoke weed, honor roll."
"Don't ask permisson, just ask forgiveness."
"If you pillow talking with the women that are screwin' you just know that she gon' tell another nigga when she through wit you."
"I'm just filling up this daily planner, gettin' busy 'cause I'm a star, no spangled banner."
"I'm a ma'fuckin' missed target. But a target nonetheless and I just started."
"I just want to tell the truth Before one of the haters load up a couple shells and shoot"
"I grow tired of these fuckin' grown man liars storytellers, they ain't even need a campfire."
"They always tell me nobody's workin' as hard as you. And even though I laugh it off, man, it's probably true."
"Rolexes, chauffeurs, and low fades. I keep thinking, how young can you die from old age?"
"I been up for four days gettin' money both ways. Dirty and clean, I could use a glass of cold Spades."
"Yes I make mistakes that I don't ever make excuses for, like leaving girls that love me and constantly seducing hoes."
"What am I doing? Oh yeah, that's right, I'm doing me, I'm doing me. I'm living life right now, man, and this what I'mma do 'til it's over."
"All the care that we take...all the love that we make..."
"I'm urgin' all daughters to kiss they mothers, with those lips that all that lipstick covers. You're never too grown up to miss and hug her."
"Wassup with these new niggas? And why they think it all comes so easy."

"All I care about is money and city that I'm from, I'm a sip until I feel it I'm a smoke until it's done. I don't really give a fuck my excuse is that I'm young, and I'm only gettin older somebody should of told you I'm one."
"The mother of your child always tell you I'm her favorite. She call me her baby, not the one she was in labor with."
"Making all the same mistakes and I'm just trying to correct it and I fall."
"It's been one of those days, you try and forget about. Take a shot and let it out."
"Still ain't tryna die to get to heaven."
"They tryna bring us down me, Weezy and Stunna We stayed up, Christmas lights in the middle of summer."
"I feel like lately I went from top 5 to remaining 5. My favourite rappers either lost it or they aint alive."
"Ohh, I never seen the car you claim to drive. Shit I seen it, you just aint inside."
"Cant tell you how much I love when niggas think they got it and I love the fact that line made em think about it."
"I aint lying, yeah and comfortable I sit. That manual Ferrari Italian, some fly shit . Its sittin at the house like I bought it in 9-6. Cause honestly Im too f-cking busy to drive stick."
"We go on dates I send the Maybach out the neighbourhoods, they never seen it. That shit is dangerous but it so convenient."
"Yeh, and lately I do bitches the meanest. Tell em I love em and dont ever mean it."
"I want women to cry and pour out their heart for me and tell me how much they hate it when they apart from me."
"I got car money, fresh start money. I want Saudi money, I want art money."
"Ahh, this is perfect for the women that I love before. I love them all, I just love me more."
"Okay...live my life in hotels. Bitch better have my room right. If they kill me, bury me a legend. Bitch better have my tomb right."
"They watch us make that shit into a song. Ya aint livin that boy stop stealin that life. Anything could happen when I do see ya. Guess it all depends on how Im feelin that night."
"Thats that fake shit, thats that fake shit. That that top row of veneers. Just when they getting impatient. When I make a World premiere."
"Wassup, real nigga doing real stuff. Get a lot of money, you could never get enough and you know the new shit sounds so tough. So and so just walked on, so what?"
"Dreams money can buy. They told me its like a high, it wasnt a lie."
"Yeah, I throw my dollars up high and they land on the stage you dance on. We got company coming over. Would it kill you to put some pants on?"
"If the girl standing next to me got a fat ass. Then Ill probably give her my number."
"The game needed life, I put my heart in it."
"Send the haters all my love, xoxo."
"I am murdering it's so amusing, if their a site to see I am a illusion."
"Even though I want it too this shit don't last forever, but better late than never."
"That's why I never follow y'all suggestions, I just always did my own thing now I run the game, you stupid muddasuckassss"
"I'm on one. Yeah, fuck it, I'm on one."
"Im like a waiter and you something like a hater with trays in both hands, place an order I can cater."
"F-ck you, p-ssy ass haters you should do you."
"F-ck it me and Nicki Nick gettin married today. And all you b-tches that be hating can catch a bouquet."
"Take photos with hater n-ggas and crop them. I am not them. I photoshop them out cause they dont understand what Im about."
"My song is your girlfriends waking up ringer...or alarm or whatever."
"These women living like they tryna write a book after. But I'm just trying to keep it G for my chapter."
"Cups of the rozay, bitches in my old phone. I should call one and go home, I been in this club way too long."
"I've had sex four times this week I'll explain, having a hard time adjusting to fame."
"I need you right now are you down to listen to me. I got some women that's livin off me, pay for their flights and hotels I'm ashamed."
"I don't think I'm conscious of makin monsters out of the women that I sponsor til it all goes bad."
"I think I'm addicted to naked pictures and sittin talkin bout bitches that we almost had."
"Fuck that nigga that you think you found, and since you pick up I know that he's not around."
"I'm just sayin that you can better, tell me have you heard that lately."
"Fuck that nigga that you love so bad, I know you still think about the times we had."
"The woman that I would try, is happy with a good guy. But I've been drinking so much Imma call her anyway."
"Empty home...pretty things...tryna write the songs that my city sings..."
"I promise I've been thinking before yall, I barely get tired Im rarely inspired."
"I love you as much as you love me...so if you hate me it works out perfectly."
"What I tend to do is think of today as the past. It's funny when you're coming in first, but you hope that you're last, you just hope... that it lasts."
"Always make it work but I live like I'm retired."
"I don't trust these bitches, they might catch me slippin and put in something different."
"I'm scared to put the time in, women wanna f-ck like they're me and I'm them."
"You can look me in my eyes and see I ain't myself, cause if yall what I created then I hate myself."
"I can tell certain people don't like me no more, new shit don't excite me no more, guess that they don't really make them like me no more."
"I got new girls but none of their love is for certain, I call old girls but none their numbers are workin"
"Women dont get saved around me, even on a Sunday."
"Don't ever forget the moment you began to doubt. Transitioning from fitting into standing out."
"Hate the rumours, hate the bullshit. Hate these fucking allegations, I'm just feeling like the throne is for the taking. Watch me take it!"
"I can tell her things and treat her right, you can get whatever baby remember you're with me tonight."
"Young women are lost these days but older women dig me."
"I don't judge her but I could never love her cause to her I'm just a rapper and soon she'll have met another."
"You niggas make it so hard to be friendly when I know part of it's envy."
"I might be too strung out on compliments, overdosed on confidence. Started not to give a fuck and stop fearing the consequence."
"I be yelling out money over everything, money on my mind."
"That the real is on the rise, fuck them other guys."
"Drizzy got the money, so Drizzy gonna pay it. Those my brothers, I ain't even gotta say it."
"I know I exaggerated things, now I got it like that. Stuff my napkin in my shirt cause I'm just mobbin like that."
"I had someone tell me I fell off, ooh I needed that.And they want to see me pick back up, well where'd I leave it at?"
"They sayin' I'm back, I agree with that. I just take my time with all this shit, I still believe in that."
"The real is on the rise."
"I got a black box where suggestions go, but I don't really give a fuck it's probably best you know."
"Drinking every night because we drink to my accomplishments. Faded way too long, I'm floatin' in and out of consciousness."
"I had someone tell me I fell off, ooh I needed that and they want to see me pick back up, well where'd I leave it at?"
"They sayin' I'm back, I agree with that. I just take my time with all this shit, I still believe in that."
"I had someone tell me I fell off, ooh I needed that and they want to see me pick back up, well where'd I leave it at?"
"Soap opera rappers, all these niggas sound like "All My Children."
"I be yelling out money over everything, money on my mind. Then she wanna ask when it got so empty. Tell her I apologize, happened over time. She says they miss the old Drake, girl don't tempt me."
"I'm looking for somebody who's gonna be somebody."
"Maybe she won't...but shit then again maybe she will."
